segments.text: Is the room ready for the meeting , Miss Chen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the microphone and speakers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Have you prepared some paper and pencils for the participants ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . They have been laid by their name cards on the meeting table for each attendant .
segments.speaker: S2
